definition: river bend
the Great Bend of the Yellow River in Inner Mongolia
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: This site is located slightly north from the centre of the Hetao plain on the northern edge of the Xixia (Tangut) domain.
sentences.chinese: 該遺址位於河套平原中部偏北，地處西夏國的北部。

sentences.english: Why do the majority of customers choose to do Hetao Melon?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼廣大的客戶會選擇河套哈密瓜呢？

sentences.english: The fossil (tooth) of "Hetao Man" (UPP) discovered in Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 河套人牙齒化石在內蒙古發現。

sentences.english: If you really need to, you can set it to loop continuously.
sentences.chinese: 如果你真的需要，你可以訂到河套斷。

sentences.english: In all birds and war to adhere to ten in the evening one or two.
sentences.chinese: 河套人人和鳥的大戰要堅持到晚上十一二點。
